address: 478 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
description:
ROOM TO MOVE
This cozy cottage would be ideal for those looking to get their hands dirty, set on approximately 1146m2 this property provides you with a rural lifestyle and space to park your boat or caravan and space for your family to grow?
The spacious kitchen provides a homely hub with a gas stove plus a potbelly and ample cupboard space to prepare the daily meals, while the snug dining area and connecting lounge provide a warm area to relax in the evening. The family bathroom is more than adequate with a shower and vanity, while a separate toilet outside ensures a private space away from the morning hygiene rituals and bustle. The 2 bedrooms are tidy with a little TLC required to lift the dcor to the next level, while the overall feeling of the home is warm and welcoming. Further renovating will provide years more of comfortable living.
The ample yard is perfect to run a number of chickens or add a vegetable garden for self-sufficient living. Older style shedding is available, with a number of established trees scattered about for shade and garden interest plus a large double carport and two workshop areas every box is ticked outside.

Charm & Elegance
This charming country cottage will surprise from the moment you enter the home. From the gable ceilings in the living room to the enormous family room, to the sun soaked fully enclosed out door entertainment area.
- Set on a huge 1,227m2 block ( approx ) with rear access
- Chefs kitchen, with butler's pantry, D/W and 900mm commercial oven
- 4 car garage / work shop
With too many features to mention this home is full of value, A must to inspect.

Exceptional Home, Sensational Location
Massive 804m2 Block - Quiet Court Location - Modern Family Home
Presented FOR SALE and located in one of the best pockets in the area is this family home ready for its new owners to move in and simply relax!
Situated on an enormous 804msq block approx. this home has space for the whole family.
Two large living areas offer great open plan living with ceiling fans and large kitchen/meals area with under cover entertaining area off the family room, is perfect for entertaining friends and family. With 3 bedrooms, ducted heating, split system cooling, master with walk in robe & ensuite and main bathroom with separate toilet, this home is sure to fit the bill.
Outside this property offers double garage and a great sized back yard for the kids to play.
Located in a well sort after pocket of Crib Point, this home is within easy distance to the local shops, railway station / bus & sporting grounds, making this the ideal property.
For more information please contact Jason Dowler anytime.

Easy Living
Designed with a strong emphasis on low-maintenance living, this near new impressive two bedroom unit delivers.
Step inside this beautifully presented home to find a modern kitchen, with a bright and airy family/meals area, a great place to entertain family and friends. There is a second living area to sit back and relax in. Floating flooring, modern bathroom, split system with heating/cooling and single garage with remote door completes this opulent home.
This low maintenance home or absolute lock-and-leave convenience won't last long.
For more information or to arrange your private viewing, please contact Jason Dowler anytime.

address: 409 Stony Point Rd Crib Point VIC 3919
description:
HUGE SHED!!!!!
This pristine home is nestled in the heart of Crib Point and is sure to impress who wish to inspect. Sitting on 1242m2 approx. this property has all the features you could ask for.
A well-appointed home comprising of 3 bedrooms; master with built in robes & a great sized ensuite with corner spa bath. 2 additional bathrooms and remaining 2 bedrooms have built in robes. Open plan kitchen, dining, lounge & office. Ducted heating, a coonara fireplace and evaporative cooling provides all year round comfort.
Outdoors offers an undercover entertaining area overlooking manicured lawns with established fruit trees. A large double driveway gives access to an exceptional "True Built" shed 12m wide x 18m long with a clearance height of 3.5 metres, plenty of room for all your toys. This shed has certainly been well built with all the bells and whistles including 3 phase power and plumbing, there is also provisions for an overhead ganty/hoist.
Close to Stony Point boat ramp, local shops, public transport, primary schools and only a short drive to Peninsula Link this home offers unbeatable value!!
